document.full_text: ireland's government is watching to see what concessions it can win on its eu-imf bailout if greece is given a new deal to resolve its worsening debt crisis, a senior government minister said on sunday.
document.title: irish government sees opportunity from greek crisis
lines_and_colors: ireland's government is watching to see what concessions it can win on its eu-imf bailout if greece is given a new deal to resolve its worsening debt crisis, a senior government minister said on sunday.
